name: Ciclosys
description:
Strongly recommended to play with controller.

Ciclosys is an action game about life cicles. Life is like a day.

Made by Alien Garden:

  • Delunado: Programming & Game Design
  • Adri Indie Wolf: Art & Visuals
  • Paco Diago: Music & SFX

Made in 8 days for the Jasper Game Dev Jam.
